destroy.description: Destroys the object after some time

lock_position.description: Target cannot move or be moved

offense.description: For 4 rounds you will move forward 1 position per turn

offense.description: Deal 8 base dmg. 4 energy damage to everyone afore you and move by 1 position backwards
